downloadTitle: Design sample: Internet sites in Microsoft Azure for SharePoint Server 2013
downloadDescription: This design sample articulates recommended configurations for Internet sites in Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Services

downloadFile.name: Internet sites in Azure logical architecture.vsd
Internet sites in Azure logical architecture.pdf

detailsSection: This design sample articulates recommended configurations for Internet sites in Microsoft Azure Infrastructure Services. It includes zones, authentication, services, web applications, sites, and URLs. Use this design sample as a starting point for your own architecture.
detailsSection_file_name: Internet sites in Azure logical architecture.vsd
Internet sites in Azure logical architecture.pdf
systemRequirementsSection:
• To view the Visio version of the model, you must have Microsoft Visio 2007 or a more recent version.
  • To view the PDF version of the model, you must have a PDF viewer, such as Adobe Reader.
installInstructionSection:
1. Click the Download button in the upper right corner of this page to start the download.
  2. Click Save or Save this program to disk.
  3. Find the file on your hard disk and double-click it to open it.
